title: PanelContentManager Bug Fixes v1.6.3
details:
Fixed critical bugs in PanelContentManager.js (Bug #12, #15, #20):

Bug #12 (ROOT CAUSE): Panel never updates when open
- Changed ALL state event handlers to use forceRefresh: true
- addedHandler, updatedHandler, deletedHandler, hydratedHandler, clearedHandler

Bug #15: Storage listener doesn't update panel
- Storage listener now uses forceRefresh: true instead of checking isOpen

Bug #20: Panel opens with wrong state  
- setIsOpen() now ALWAYS calls updateContent({ forceRefresh: true }) when panel opens
- Removed the stateChangedWhileClosed condition check

Key patterns:
- Always use forceRefresh: true for state events
- Panel should update immediately on any state change
- Debug logging uses debug() helper, not console.log for frequent events
